svg.style: background: #1F1F1F; background-color: light-dark(#1F1F1F, #d2d2d2); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content:
<mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 YaBrowser/24.12.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.0.4"> <diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="1687" dy="864" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="#1F1F1F" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0" value="NodeManager" style="swimlane;fontStyle=2;align=center;verticalAlign=top;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;startSize=26;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeLast=0;collapsible=1;marginBottom=0;rounded=0;shadow=0;strokeWidth=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;swimlaneLine=1;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;fontFamily=Ubuntu;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="14" y="250" width="800" height="890" as="geometry"> <mxRectangle x="230" y="140" width="160" height="26" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-10" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); line-height: 19px; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span style="line-height: 100%;"><font style="font-size: 10px;"><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);"><b>NodeManager</b></span>() <span style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">=</span> <span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">default</span>;</font></span></div>" vertex="1" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0"> <mxGeometry y="26" width="800" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--2" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); line-height: 19px; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span><font style="font-size: 10px;"><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);"><b>NodeManager</b></span>(<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">BaseData</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">bd</span>):<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">bd_</span>(<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">bd</span>){}</font></span></div>" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="46" width="800" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--3" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); line-height: 19px; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><span><font><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);"><b>~NodeManager</b></span>();</font></span></div>" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rounded=0;shadow=0;html=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;fontSize=10;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;fontFamily=Ubuntu;" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="66" width="800" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-16" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); line-height: 19px; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><div><span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);"><b>NodeManager</b></span>(<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">NodeManager</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>):</span></div><div><span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">references_</span>(<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>.<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">references_</span>),</span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);"> //childs_(other.childs_),</span></div><div><span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner_</span>(<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>.<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner_</span>){</span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);"> //TODO: create variable-copies in copied relation_manager</span></div><div><span> }</span></div></div>" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rounded=0;shadow=0;html=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;fontSize=10;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;fontFamily=Ubuntu;" vertex="1" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0"> <mxGeometry y="86" width="800" height="114" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-15" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); line-height: 19px; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><div style=""><span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);"><b>NodeManager</b></span>(<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">NodeManager</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;&amp;</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>):</span></div><div style=""><span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">references_</span>(<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">move</span>(<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>.<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">references_</span>)),</span></div><div style=""><span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">childs_</span>(<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">move</span>(<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>.<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">childs_</span>)),</span></div><div style=""><span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner_</span>(<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">move</span>(<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">other</span>.<span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner_</span>)){}</span></div></div>" style="text;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rounded=0;shadow=0;html=1;fontColor=#CC0000;spacing=0;fontSize=10;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;fontStyle=1;strokeColor=#FFFFFF;fontFamily=Ubuntu;" vertex="1" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0"> <mxGeometry y="280" width="800" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-13" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); line-height: 19px; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span> <span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">void</span> <span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">begin</span>(<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">NodeManager</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span>);<span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);"> //use anonymous NodeManager for safe inclusions</span></font></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span> <span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">void</span> <span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">end</span>(<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">NodeManager</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span>);<span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);"> //safe_merge if no one exception was thrown</span></font></div></div>" style="text;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=4;spacingRight=4;overflow=hidden;rotatable=0;points=[[0,0.5],[1,0.5]];portConstraint=eastwest;rounded=0;shadow=0;html=1;fontColor=#FFFFFF;spacing=0;fontSize=10;labelPosition=center;verticalLabelPosition=middle;fontFamily=Ubuntu;" vertex="1" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0"> <mxGeometry y="340" width="800" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-11" value="<div style="font-weight: normal; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre;"><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));"><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">insert_back</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">,</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">::</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">unique_ptr</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;&amp;</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">new_child</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">);</span></font></div><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));"><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"><div style="line-height: 19px;"><font><div><span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">//"child" must be already put in NodeManager. If this NodeManager and "child" hasn't owner, then "child" become pure child of "node"</span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">//else ReferenceNode created and "child" is refered by it</span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">insert_back</span>(<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span>,<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">unique_ptr</span>&lt;<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span>&gt;<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">child</span>);</div></font></div></span></div><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));"><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">insert_back_ref</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">ReferenceNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">,</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">new_child</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">);</span></font></div><div style=""><font style=""><span><div style="background-color: rgb(31, 31, 31); line-height: 19px;"><div style=""><span><font style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);">//insert before value at id</font></span></div><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));"><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">insert</span>(<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span>,<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">size_t</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">id</span>,<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">unique_ptr</span>&lt;<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span>&gt;<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;&amp;</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">new_child</span>);</div><div style="color: light-dark(rgb(204, 204, 204), rgb(62, 62, 62));"><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">replace</span>(<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span>, <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">size_t</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">id</span>,<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">unique_ptr</span>&lt;<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span>&gt;<span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;&amp;</span> <span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">new_child</span>);</div></div></span></font></div></div>" vertex="1" parent="zkfFHV4jXpPFQw0GAbJ--0"> <mxGeometry y="510" width="800" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-24" value="<div style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204); font-weight: normal; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre;"><div style=""><span style="color: rgb(106, 153, 85);"><font style="">//does not delete the replaced pointer's node</font></span></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">replace_child_wo_delete_in_owner_by</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">, </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">size_t</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">id</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">, </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">val</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">){</span></font></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">assert</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">val</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&amp;&amp;</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&amp;&amp;</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">-&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">has_child</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">id</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">) </span><span style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">&amp;&amp;</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">val</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">-&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">relation_manager</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">()</span><span style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">==</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">-&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">relation_manager</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">());</span></font></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">-&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">relation_manager</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">()-&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">childs_</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">.</span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">at</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">owner</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">).</span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">at</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">id</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">)</span><span style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212);">=</span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">val</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">;</span></font></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(197, 134, 192);">return</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">val</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">;</span></font></div><div style=""><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"><font>}</font></span></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">add_node</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">NodeManager</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">,</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">::</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">unique_ptr</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">&amp;&amp;</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">);</span></font></div><div style=""><font><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">void</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(220, 220, 170);">delete_node</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">(</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">AbstractNode</span><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">*</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(156, 220, 254);">node</span><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);">);</span></font></div><div style=""><font style=""><span style="color: rgb(204, 204, 204);"><div style="line-height: 19px;"><span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">static</span> <span style="color: rgb(86, 156, 214);">const</span> <span style="color: rgb(78, 201, 176);">std</span>::<span style="color: rgb(78, 201, </mxCell> <mxCell id="40SL63pZetePlAHfBNr6-1" value="1. Add nodes
2. Delete nodes
3. Unique nodes
4. Safe modifying
5. Copying
6. Swaping (cut-paste)
7. Temporal creation node 
with child replation
(only ArrayNode)
(Maybe add static function

div.font: static void begin(NodeManager*); //use anonymous NodeManager for safe inclusions
static void end(NodeManager*); //safe_merge if no one exception was thrown

div.span: //"child" must be already put in NodeManager. If this NodeManager and "child" hasn't owner, then "child" become pure child of "node"
//else ReferenceNode created and "child" is refered by it

font.div: static AbstractNode* insert_back(const AbstractNode* node,const std::unique_ptr<AbstractNode>& child);
